title: Fix package/resource location in example tests
description:
From #13482 (comment):

We have a bunch of other example tests that we merged that need to be fixed:

➜  checkstyle git:(master) ag -Q 'return "xdocs-examples";' -B 1 | grep 'getPackageLocation' | wc -l
14



➜  checkstyle git:(master) ✗  ag -Q 'return "xdocs-examples";' -B 1 | grep 'getPackageLocation' | cut -d'-' -f 2
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/design/DesignForExtensionCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/annotation/AnnotationOnSameLineCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/annotation/AnnotationUseStyleCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/annotation/MissingDeprecatedCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/design/HideUtilityClassConstructorCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/annotation/MissingOverrideCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/annotation/SuppressWarningsCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/blocks/EmptyBlockCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/blocks/EmptyCatchBlockCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/blocks/AvoidNestedBlocksCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/blocks/RightCurlyCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/blocks/LeftCurlyCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/blocks/NeedBracesCheckExamplesTest.java:30
examples/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/design/FinalClassCheckExamplesTest.java:30
